page.title: 15A DAY IN MY HOLIDAY-10yr old
page.content:
On Wednesday my Dad told us to get ready because we were going to Salcombe for the day. On the way we stopped at a pub and while Mum and Dad went for a drink my brother and I went on the swings.
The first thing I did when we got to Salcombe was to play in the sand making sand castles. My baby brother paddled in the sea. The sea was very cold. After lunch we walked around the town looking in the shops.
Before we came home we bought sausages and chips to eat on the way home in the car. I ate mine in the boot.
We arived home at about 10 o'clock. By then the babies were asleep, and I had slept in the car, too. We had a cup of tea and I went to bed.
